page.title: 02POPULATION-HOUSING/STURTON
page.content: THE POPULATION HAS BEEN STEADILY INCREASING OVER THE YEARS WITH {12OO}PERSONS LIVING IN STURTON AND SOME{15O}RESIDING IN THE REST OF THE AREA. IN STURTON,{24%}ARE UNDER 16, {58% }ARE OF WORKING AGE AND{18%}ARE RETIRED. THE{41O}PROPERTIES IN STURTON,25% OF WHICH HAVE BEEN BUILT IN THE LAST 1O YEARS,ARE LARGELY {PRIVATELY OWNED.}THERE ARE SOME {COUNCIL HOUSES}WITH BUNGALOWS AND FLATS SPECIFICALLY FOR THE ELDERLY. THE CURRENT TREND FOR BUILDING IS FOR HOUSES AS OPPOSED TO BUNGALOWS OWING TO THE COST OF DEVELOPMENT LAND. FUTURE DEVELOPMENT WITHIN THE VILLAGE IS CONFINED TO{INFILL}AND IN THE OUTLYING AREAS TO{AGRICULTURAL {BUILDINGS.}MATERIALS IN THE PAST WERE {RED BRICK AND PANTILE}BUT PLANNING NOW ONLY REQUIRES A BLEND WITH THE SURROUNDING BUILDINGS.
